text: Anders Larsson is a Swedish former cross-country skier. He was born on 3 October 1961 in Karlstad, Sweden. During his career, he represented Bondsjöhöjdens IK in club competitions. He also participated at the 1984 Olympic Winter Games in Sarajevo. There, he finished 39th in the 50 kilometres race. He also won Vasaloppet in 1987.SVT - Vasaloppets alla vinnare In 1982 he was awarded the Sixten Jernberg Award. == References == Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:Swedish skiers Category:People from Karlstad
title: Anders Larsson
